00037 /*! Provides interfaces to update data in a "Calvin" binary "MultiData" data file.
00038  * This class assumes that the file has been completely written and that
00039  * only existing data groups/sets/rows/cols are being modified.
00040  */
00041 class CalvinCHPMultiDataFileUpdater : public DataSetUpdater
00042 {
00043 public:
00044         /*! Constructor */
00045         CalvinCHPMultiDataFileUpdater();
00046 
00047         /*! Destructor */
00048         ~CalvinCHPMultiDataFileUpdater();
00049 
00050         /*! Initialize the class given a "calvin" data file.
00051          * @param file The name of the file.
00052          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileNotFoundException The file does not exist.
00053          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidVersionException The file version does not match.
00054          * @exception affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidFileTypeException The file is not of the right type.
00055          */
00056         void Initialize(const char *file);
00057 
00058         /*! Update the entry for the given row
00059          * @param row The row index.
00060          * @param entry The new MultiData value.
00061      * @param metricColumns The column information.
00062          */
00063         void UpdateMultiData(MultiDataType dataType, int row, const affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData &entry, const std::vector<ColumnInfo> &metricColumns);
00064 
00065         /*! Update only the call and confidence for the given row
00066          * @param row The row index.
00067          * @param entry The new MultiData value.
00068          */
00069         void UpdateMultiData(MultiDataType dataType, int row, const affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData &entry);
00070
